feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.51.11: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#3167) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1063.0 to 1.1064.0 (#3166) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-core from 1.7.1 to 1.8.0 (#3165) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.11 to 3.1.12 (#3163) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump devise-i18n from 1.12.1 to 1.13.0 (#3161) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump i18n-tasks from 1.0.14 to 1.0.15 (#3160) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1062.0 to 1.1063.0 (#3159) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.220.0 to 3.220.1 (#3155) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1061.0 to 1.1062.0 (#3154) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1060.0 to 1.1061.0 (#3151) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.49.0 to 0.50.0 (#3149) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.11 to 2.0.13 (#3148) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.10 to 3.1.11 (#3147) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-errors from 1.4.0 to 1.5.0 (#3145) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump overcommit from 0.67.0 to 0.67.1 (#3146) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.219.0 to 3.220.0 (#3143) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump cssbundling-rails from 1.4.2 to 1.4.3 (#3142) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.51.11

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.52.0: Re-enable Arm64 Docker Container Builds
entry.content:
arm64 architecture Docker container builds are back.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Restore Docker arm64 builds (#3172) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump json from 2.10.1 to 2.10.2 (#3182) @dependabot[bot]

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.0: New Bundled Background Workers
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release adds new functionality to the pglombardo/pwpush container. It now runs the worker processes to periodically run required background tasks.

If you are currently using the Beta pwpush-worker container, you can either remove that container entirely or set PWP__NO_WORKER=true in the pwpush container to disable the background workers added in this release.

Read more in the Background Tasks documentation.

  • Bundled Worker with Automatic Recurring Background Jobs (#3183) @pglombardo
  • Run Background Worker in Core Container (#3170) @pglombardo
  • Add Purge Unattached Blobs Job (#3171) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.53.0

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.1: Fix Docker Port Overrides
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

When running the pglombardo/pwpush Docker container, it defaults to port 5100. You can now override this using the PORT environment variable. Some cloud platforms set this environment variable automatically based on deployment needs.

docker run -p 7501:7501 -e PORT=7501 pglombardo/pwpush:1.53.1

Thanks @iungoron for reporting!

  • Docker: Set default port to 5100 (#3189) @pglombardo
  • Fix: Foreman port ordering (#3188) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.25.4 to 5.25.5 (#3184) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors
